tickets.content: SAP Cloud Integration (CPI) is a cloud-based integration service that connects applications and systems in real time.
It allows seamless integration between SAP and non-SAP systems, both on-premise and in the cloud.
Integration Flows (iFlows) define the logic and mapping between sender and receiver systems.
They handle message transformations, routing, and error handling for integration scenarios.
Message Mapping in SAP CPI allows you to transform data from a source format to a target format.
Graphical mapping tools or scripting can be used for complex transformations.
After designing your iFlow, you can deploy it to your CPI tenant.
Deployment ensures that your integration logic is active and can process real messages.
